00202 template <int Size, class Element>
00203 inline TVector<Size, Element>::TVector(const TVector<Size, Element>& vector)
00204 {
00205        for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00206               m_elements[i] = vector.m_elements[i];
00207        }
00208 }

00298 template <int Size, class Element>
00299 inline bool TVector<Size, Element>::IsNull(Element tolerance) const
00300 {
00301        return GetLength2() <= tolerance * tolerance;
00302 }

00305 template <int Size, class Element>
00306 inline Element TVector<Size, Element>::GetDotProduct(const TVector<Size, Element>& vector) const
00307 {
00308        Element retVal = 0.0;
00309 
00310        for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00311               retVal +=  m_elements[i] * vector.m_elements[i];
00312        }
00313 
00314        return retVal;
00315 }

00325 template <int Size, class Element>

00340 inline Element TVector<Size, Element>::GetDistance(const TVector<Size, Element>& vector) const

00591 template <int Size, class Element>
00592 bool TVector<Size, Element>::Normalize(Element length)
00593 {
00594     Element isLength = GetLength();
00595 
00596     Element proportion = isLength / length;
00597 
00598        if (qAbs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00599         for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00600             m_elements[i] = m_elements[i] / proportion;
00601         }
00602 
00603               return true;
00604     }
00605        else{
00606               return false;
00607        }
00608 }
00609 
00610 
00611 template <int Size, class Element>
00612 bool TVector<Size, Element>::GetNormalized(TVector<Size, Element>& result, Element length) const
00613 {
00614     Element isLength = GetLength();
00615 
00616     Element proportion = isLength / length;
00617 
00618        if (qAbs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00619         for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00620             result.m_elements[i] = m_elements[i] / proportion;
00621         }
00622 
00623               return true;
00624     }
00625        else{
00626               return false;
00627        }
00628 }

00631 template <int Size, class Element>
00632 void TVector<Size, Element>::GetMinimal(const TVector<Size, Element>& vector, TVector<Size, Element>& result) const
00633 {
00634        for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00635               result.SetElement(i, qMin(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00636        }
00637 }

00640 template <int Size, class Element>
00641 void TVector<Size, Element>::GetMaximal(const TVector<Size, Element>& vector, TVector<Size, Element>& result) const
00642 {
00643        for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00644               result.SetElement(i, qMax(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00645        }
00646 }

00649 template <int Size, class Element>
00650 bool TVector<Size, Element>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00651 {
00652        bool retVal = true;
00653 
00654        for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00655               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_elements[i]);
00656        }
00657 
00658        return retVal;
00659 }
